    • attach

      public void attach(Observer observer) throws BanksException
      Function attaches observer by adding it to bank's list and changing boolean field isSubscribed to true.
      Specified by:
      attach in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      observer - Subscriber that wants to be notified about events.
      Throws:
      BanksException - when client is already subscribed.

    • detach

      public void detach(Observer observer) throws BanksException
      Function detaches observer by remocing it from bank's list and changing boolean field isSubscribed to false.
      Specified by:
      detach in interface Subject
      Parameters:
      observer - Subscriber that wants to be NOT notified about events anymore.
      Throws:
      BanksException - when client is already unsubscribed.
